data.name: After The End: The Harvest
data.detailed_description:
Early Access

This is an open-world game that is still on-going development, it is possible that some bugs may occur.

If bugs are found, please post them in the discussion boards. Updates with new content and fixes are released regularly. Please check the Announcements for information on the latest updates.


About the Game



Humanity has all but disappeared from its original planet and home, with only its remnants remaining loosely scattered across the universe.
Those who were not worthy did not graduate the cycle.
By chance encounter with an intelligent being, you begin your journey to unravel the great mystery of the universe itself.

There is no one way to reach the finish. Players are almost immediately left to explore at their own leisure.

Game Currently Includes-

-Sci-fi/Fantasy Setting
-Huge Open Worlds Set Across Space and Various Planets
-Real-time Spaceship Combat
-Over 15+ Planets To Explore
-Action RPG Combat
-100 Monsters to Catch, Train and Battle
-Two Unique Endings
-Karma System
-Wanted System
-Lootable Environments Including Planets, Moons, Derelict Space Stations, Monster Infested Asteroids & More
-Crafting Hunting & Scavenging Mechanics
-Non-Linear Questing: Go About Your Adventure In Almost Any Way You Desire
-Huge Open Environments Filled With Unique Characters To Interact With, Items To Find, Monsters To Hunt & History To Explore
-Spacesuit: Enables You To Breathe and float In Space
-Heaps Of Enemies And Bosses
-Hidden Areas
-Plenty Of Side Quests With Interesting Characters, Rewards, and Outcomes
-Planetary Day/Night Cycles
-Unique Planetary Climate Systems
-Planets With Villages, Quests, Items & Monsters
-Heaps Of Choices For Weapons And Magic
-Adventure (Challenge) Mode
and much more!

Current build is Beta V0.5u2

data.short_description:
After The End: The Harvest is an immersive retro space adventure and exploration rpg.
Seamlessly travel across space, catch monsters, take on quests and fight monsters in whatever order you choose.
Fly your ship, land on planets and hunt gigantic titans!
data.reviews:
“An immense sandbox that is filled with quests to do, a multitude of items and equipment to collect, and not to mention a wide array of spells to perform.”
Hardcore Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5700 HD or Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
